modShortDescription: Makes all the grasses in the game short. Leaves Snowberry normal due to it blocking building. Now you can more easily see what to clear for building.
modDescription:
Makes all the grasses in the game short. Leaves Snowberry normal due to it blocking building. Now you can more easily see what to clear for building.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_Blocks_AllShortGrass)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).
